Replaces Unit Name and target names with custom settable Names. 

for details go to Bars -> text -> custom text and add
[code = {Lua}]
{func local player, combat = ...; local Lib = LibStub("CustomNames");local trans=LibStub("LibTranslit-1.0");return trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", ""))):find("-") and player.transliteratedName or trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", "")));}
[/code]
this should replace data2 (player name) which in total would look like:
[code = {Lua}]
{data1}. {data3}{func local player, combat = ...; local Lib = LibStub("CustomNames");local trans=LibStub("LibTranslit-1.0");return trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", ""))):find("-") and player.transliteratedName or trans:Transliterate(Lib.Get(string.gsub(player.nome, "%-([A-Z][A-Z])$", "")));}
[/code]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=36] REQUIRES [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/libcustomnames]Custom Names[/url] in order to work  [/size][/color][/b]
